item.title: Evolutionary Database Design: Managing Change and Scaling with the System
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Problem Statement You’ve built a public asset management app that’s become essential for tracking infrastructure and city resources. With early adoption secured, growth is on the horizon—but so are challenges.
